response_parsed.title: Packaging Microservices Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide provides a comprehensive walkthrough on how to package microservices using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Preparing for production: Dockerizing the app

code_examples.code:
FROM python:3.12
WORKDIR /app
COPY . /app
RUN pip install fastapi uvicorn
CMD ["uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "80"]

version_notes: FastAPI version: latest stable (0.76.0 as of Oct 2022)
caveats: Ensure you have Docker and Python 3.12 installed on your system.
This guide assumes a basic understanding of FastAPI, Python, and Docker.
